## Cache Flow Diagram

### First Run (No Cache)

```
Start Job
  â”œâ”€ Pull Docker image: 15s
  â”œâ”€ Checkout code: 5s
  â”œâ”€ Setup Node/pnpm: 10s
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ [pnpm store] Cache MISS
  â”‚  â””â”€ pnpm install: 2m 30s âŒ›
  â”‚     â””â”€ Save to cache: 5s
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ [Build] Cache MISS
  â”‚  â””â”€ pnpm build: 45s âŒ›
  â”‚     â””â”€ Save to cache: 5s
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ [Playwright] Cache MISS
  â”‚  â””â”€ Browser download: 2m 00s âŒ›
  â”‚     â””â”€ Save to cache: 5s
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ Claude Code analysis: 30s
  â””â”€ Total: ~6 minutes

After: Caches saved for next run âœ…
```

### Subsequent Runs (With Cache)

```
Start Job
  â”œâ”€ Pull Docker image: [instant, cached locally]
  â”œâ”€ Checkout code: 5s
  â”œâ”€ Setup Node/pnpm: 10s
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ [pnpm store] Cache HIT
  â”‚  â””â”€ Restore from cache: 5s âš¡ (was 2m 30s)
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ [Build] Cache HIT
  â”‚  â””â”€ Use cached .next: [instant] âš¡ (was 45s)
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ [Playwright] Cache HIT
  â”‚  â””â”€ Use cached browsers: [instant] âš¡ (was 2m)
  â”‚
  â”œâ”€ Claude Code analysis: 30s
  â””â”€ Total: ~1 minute 15 seconds

Improvement: 68% faster! ğŸš€
```

## Parallel Cache Architecture

```
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚  GitHub Actions Cache Storageâ”‚
â”‚                              â”‚
â”‚  â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”‚
â”‚  â”‚ linux-pnpm-store      â”‚ â”‚  â† Primary cache
â”‚  â”‚ 150MB                 â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚ Key: hash(lock.yaml)  â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ â”‚
â”‚           â–²                  â”‚
â”‚           â”‚ Hit/Miss         â”‚
â”‚           â”‚                  â”‚
â”‚  â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”‚
â”‚  â”‚ linux-nextjs-*        â”‚ â”‚  â† Build cache
â”‚  â”‚ 100MB                 â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚ Key: hash(package)    â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ â”‚
â”‚           â–²                  â”‚
â”‚           â”‚ Hit/Miss         â”‚
â”‚           â”‚                  â”‚
â”‚  â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â” â”‚
â”‚  â”‚ linux-playwright-*    â”‚ â”‚  â† Browser cache
â”‚  â”‚ 100MB                 â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â”‚ Key: hash(package)    â”‚ â”‚
â”‚  â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜ â”‚
â”‚           â–²                  â”‚
â”‚           â”‚ Hit/Miss         â”‚
â”‚           â”‚                  â”‚
â”‚  Total: 200-300MB            â”‚
â”‚  Limit: 5GB                  â”‚
â”‚  Retention: 7 days (auto)    â”‚
â”‚                              â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
```

## Workflow Execution Timeline

### Performance Comparison

```
WITHOUT CACHING:
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Docker: 15s
â”œâ”€ Setup: 25s
â”œâ”€ Install: 2m 30s â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â”œâ”€ Build: 45s â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â”œâ”€ Tests: 2m 00s â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â”œâ”€ Claude Code: 30s
â””â”€ Total: 6m 25s

WITH CACHING:
â”‚
â”œâ”€ Docker: [instant]
â”œâ”€ Setup: 25s
â”œâ”€ Cache restore: 5s âœ“
â”œâ”€ Build: [instant] âœ“
â”œâ”€ Tests: [instant] âœ“
â”œâ”€ Claude Code: 30s
â””â”€ Total: 1m 00s

SAVINGS:
Reduction: 5m 25s (84% faster!)
```

## Job Dependencies

```
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚                    Workflow                     â”‚
â”‚              (claude-code-docker)               â”‚

         â”‚
         â–¼
```

## Cache Key Generation

```
pnpm Store Key Calculation:
â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”
${{ runner.os }}-pnpm-store-${{ hashFiles('**/pnpm-lock.yaml') }}
     â”‚                                      â”‚
     â”‚                                      â””â”€ Changes when:
     â”‚                                         - pnpm install executed
     â”‚                                         - Dependencies updated
     â”‚                                         - package.json modified
     â”‚
     â””â”€ Changes when running on:
        - Different OS (linux/macos/windows)
        - Same cache shared across OS


Example Keys:
â€¢ linux-pnpm-store-a1b2c3d4e5f6
â€¢ macos-pnpm-store-a1b2c3d4e5f6
â€¢ windows-pnpm-store-a1b2c3d4e5f6

(Same hash, different OS = separate caches)
```

## What Gets Cached

### pnpm Store (`~/.pnpm-store`)

```
~/.pnpm-store/
â”œâ”€â”€ v3/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ files/
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ react@18.3.1/
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ next@15.3.3/
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ typescript@5.8.2/
â”‚       â”œâ”€â”€ tailwindcss@3.4.1/
â”‚       â””â”€â”€ [300+ other packages]
â”‚
Size: ~100-150MB
Restored in: ~5 seconds
```

### Next.js Build (`.next/`)

```
.next/
â”œâ”€â”€ static/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ chunks/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ css/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ media/
â”œâ”€â”€ server/
â”œâ”€â”€ cache/
â””â”€â”€ telemetry/

Size: ~50-100MB
Restored in: instant (already in repo)
```

### Playwright Browsers (`~/.cache/ms-playwright`)

```
~/.cache/ms-playwright/
â”œâ”€â”€ chromium-xxxxx/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ chrome-linux/
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ [browser binaries]
â”œâ”€â”€ ffmpeg-xxxxx/
â””â”€â”€ [other browser versions]

Size: ~50-100MB
Downloaded normally in: ~2 minutes
Restored from cache: instant
```

**Key Benefits:**
âœ… No reinstalls on every run
âœ… Faster feedback loops
